sentences: See pink on ehitatud standardsete sõlmede baasil.
Agregaat, mis on ehitatud spetsiaalseks otstarbeks.
context: The Estonian word 'ehitatud' is the past participle form of the verb 'ehitama', which means 'to build' or 'to construct'. It describes something that has been built or constructed, often referring to manufactured items, machines, or structures. In this context, it appears in technical specifications for industrial equipment.
